
Subject: Your dedicated server has expired

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your dedicated server %%%SERVER_HOSTNAME%%%
has expired %%%EXPIRED_DAYS%%% days ago, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%%, click on your server tab, and renew it.

We will keep your dedicated server up few days to give you the time to
renew your contract.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
